summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. B-159, for the improvement of West 64th Street (formerly North Street) from 20th Avenue Northwest to 22nd Avenue Northwest, by grading and by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 1240 of the former City of Ballard, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
